column4: Hmm, I've got an AMD 64 cpu does this mean I have to have the x64 of ubuntu? Or will 32 bit work?
Its just i'm having a problem with the new kernel (when on 32bit) and was wondering if I switched to 64bit it would solve the problem? (Kernel panics...)
It might, but then you'd have difficulty running proprietary binary packages that don't have 64bit versions/
